data.name: Environmental impact of cryptocurrencies
data.text: Consider the environmental impact of cryptocurrencies. Some cryptocurrencies consume a significant amount of energy, contributing to carbon emissions. Before investing, research the energy consumption and environmental policies of the cryptocurrency you're interested in.

questions.text: From ethics perspective, what should you consider when investing in cryptocurrencies?

answers.text: To understand its impact on the environment
To find out its market capitalization
To know its historical price performance

data.name: Blockchain and sustainability
data.text: Explore the potential of blockchain technology for sustainable solutions. Blockchain has the ability to enhance transparency, traceability, and accountability in supply chains, promoting ethical and sustainable practices. Look for projects that leverage blockchain to address environmental challenges and support positive impact initiatives.
